thread.title: BRIEF-Hudbay Minerals Says Fireweed Issued 3.6 Mln Shares To Co As Partial Consideration For Acquisition Of 100 Pct Interest In Tom & Jason Project

title: BRIEF-Hudbay Minerals Says Fireweed Issued 3.6 Mln Shares To Co As Partial Consideration For Acquisition Of 100 Pct Interest In Tom & Jason Project

organizations.name: pct interest in tom & jason project reuters staff

text:
#Market News February 7, 2018 / 10:15 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Hudbay Minerals Says Fireweed Issued 3.6 Mln Shares To Co As Partial Consideration For Acquisition Of 100 Pct Interest In Tom & Jason Project Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Hudbay Minerals Inc: 
* HUDBAY MINERALS INC - FIREWEED ISSUED 3.6 MILLION SHARES TO CO AS PARTIAL CONSIDERATION FOR ACQUISITION OF 100 PCT INTEREST IN TOM & JASON PROJECT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
